name: Pigman
description:
Walk through the cave in the dark to bring the pig lunch to your family. Be careful, your torch burns overtime and you will die if you end up with a consumed torch.

CONTROLS:

A-D -> Move horizontally

W -> Jump

S -> Attack

Space -> Throw torch

CREDITS:

Code & Unity work - Jeepitou

Art & Animation - @oodnuf (https://www.instagram.com/oodnuf/?hl=en)

Music & Sound design - @miguiz_ (https://www.instagram.com/miguiz_/?hl=en)
